passwordRequirementsBody: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain:
incorrectPasswordMessage: The username/password you entered is incorrect.
about: GEO REPORT is your one-stop platform for reporting and tracking local issues. Whether it's potholes, broken streetlights, or graffiti, easily pinpoint the location on our map and provide essential details. Our dedicated team will review your report and work to resolve the problem promptly.
